sentences.sentence: Brazil's president, Lula da Silva Silva is warning against European protectionism.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: He says that the ratification of the E.U.-Mercosur trade agreement should happen by the end of the year, but he wants an equal partnership between the two sides.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: He was speaking in Brussels on Wednesday following a summit between the E.U. and Latin America, where he made it clear that both sides have the right to protectionism, even if it isn't the best way forward. do seu frango, da sua verdura, do seu queijo, do seu leite, do seu vinho.

sentences.sentence: Então, da mesma forma que a França tem essa primazia de defender unhas e dentes, o seu patrimônio produtivo, nós temos o interesse de defender o nosso.

sentences.sentence: Uma carta da parte da União Europeia foi enviada para os países de Mercosul em fevereiro, com demandas sobre a preservação ambiental da floresta de Amazonas.

sentences.sentence: É outro obstáculo para a signing-off do acordo de negociação com o Bloco, que é feito em Brasil, Argentina, Paraguai e Uruguai. Quais seriam os pontos centrais para o Brasil nessa carta? We don't have a problem. We wrote a letter of response and we think that the European Union will agree with our response.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: When it comes to Latin America's position on the war in Ukraine, Lula da Silva stressed the need to work quickly towards a ceasefire and again offered his mediation skills.

sentences.sentence: on Ukraine's southern port city of Odessa.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Kyiv says residential buildings were damaged by the blast or debris and that at least 12 civilians, including a child, sustained injuries in the strike.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Ukraine's President Volodymyr Zelensky has accused Moscow of deliberately targeting grain export sites in the city.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The attacks come days after Russia withdrew its participation in the Black Sea Grain Initiative, which enabled vital grain exports from Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Moscow has said the strikes were aimed at military targets and were in response to a blast on a bridge linking Russia to the occupied Crimean Peninsula on Monday which it has blamed on Ukraine. The bombing took place amid Ukraine's ongoing counter-offensive and Russian offensive operations. The Ukrainian command sees these attacks as an attempt to make the situation even harder in the south by targeting crucial infrastructure.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The South African government has confirmed that Russian President Vladimir Putin will not travel to the country next month to attend a BRICS summit.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Putin is subject to an arrest warrant by the International Criminal Court, to which South Africa is his signatory.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: That means that they would be responsible for detaining him should he enter the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: But Moscow has made it clear that any such move would be tantamount to a declaration of war against Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: BRICS is an acronym for Brazil, Russia, India, China and South Africa, and the group is hailed by some as an alternative to the G7. A spokesman for the South African president, Cyril Ramaphosa, said that the Russian foreign minister, Sergei Lavrov, will represent Putin at the summit. The Kremlin has denied issuing any warning to Cape Town, but insists that everyone knows what the arrest of the Russian president would mean.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Putin is wanted by the ICC in connection with the kidnapping of Ukrainian children.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Just one day after French President Emmanuel Macron criticized her appointment, America's Fiona Scott Morton has decided not to take on the role of European Union's next chief economist. In her resignation letter, Morton said that she was stepping down from the position because of the political controversy that followed. It comes after Macron argued that appointing the American economist to the role would not help the EU become more independent from the US, and that a citizen of the European Union would be a better fit for the job.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: But Macron insisted that he had nothing against the Yale professor with degrees from multiple institutions and previous experience working with the Obama administration.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Long gone are the days when Spain was one of the fewer ACs in Europe without a far-right presence in its institutions. But since 2019, the Vox party has held 52 of Parliament's 350 seats.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Of course, Vox has been whitelined. Not only after the elections in Andalusia, Ciudadanos and PP accepted to hold a demonstration with Vox in Plaza Colón. We are talking about February 19. In other words, in Spain there was never what is called a sanitary cordon, a democratic cordon, against far-right forces. En España nunca hubo lo que se llama cordón sanitario, cordón democrático, frente a fuerzas de extrema derecha. Catalan Independence in 2017. That was compounded by corruption scandals in the Popular Party and the socialists taking power thanks to the support of extreme left and secessionist parties.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Y eso evidentemente es capitalizado por Vox porque ahí encontramos uno de los mayores enemigos de Vox, la que ellos consideran la anti España. Es un fenómeno que también se explica por el miedo a lo desconocido, el cambio tecnológico que estamos viviendo y que está haciendo que hay un clivage nuevo, no solo izquierda-derecha, no solo nacionalista-no nacionalista, sino por ejemplo rural-urbano. Y por último y no menos importante, el ascensor social, el contrato social parece haberse, no sé si roto, pero al menos sí puesto en cuarentena.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Mirando adelante a las elecciones europeas en junio de 2024, Bruselas está preocupada por los efectos de una coalición entre el Partido Popular y Vox.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Pondría sobre la mesa la posibilidad de una futura alianza tras las próximas elecciones europeas entre el Partido Popular Europeo y los conservadores y reformistas europeos.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: ¿Pero cuánto grande será esta ola extremista?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Cuando llegan, vemos que no están en las cuestiones del día a día. Es una guerra identitaria, que no ideológica. Por lo tanto, cuando han gobernado no han repetido. Trump no repitió, Bolsonaro no repitió, veremos a ver si Meloni repite.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Y solo en los países donde esas creencias están realmente imbricadas en la sociedad, como Polonia e Hungría, resisten gobiernos así. Israeli police using water cannons to disperse protesters who massed in central Tel Aviv on Tuesday night.

sentences.sentence: They were some of tens of thousands of people who blocked highways and train stations in demonstration against Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu's controversial judicial overhaul plan.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Now in their seventh month, the protests have taken on a sense of urgency in recent days as Netanyahu and his allies press ahead with the program.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The first bill in the package, a measure that seeks to limit the Supreme Court's oversight powers, could become law as soon as next week.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Thailand's constitutional court suspended reformist Peter Lim Jaroenrat on Wednesday in another blow to his hopes of becoming the nation's next leader after a stunning election win.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: His efforts to form a government have stumbled since the May poll.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: He's widely popular with young Thais, frustrated after almost 10 years of military-backed rule, but he's fiercely opposed by Thailand's conservative establishment.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: The court could disqualify Peter from parliament altogether for owning shares in a media company, forcing his suspension.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Australian castaway Timothy Lindsay Shaddock has set foot on land for the first time since being rescued by a Mexican tuna boat after he was adrift in the Pacific with his dog Bella for two months. The 54-year-old had set sail in April from the Mexican city of La P was adrift in the Pacific with his dog Bella for two months.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The 54-year-old had set sail in April from the Mexican city of La Paz, bound for the tropical French Polynesia, but his catamaran was damaged by bad weather weeks into the 4,000-kilometer journey. He survived on raw fish and rainwater, and he has admitted he didn't think he would make it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: He didn't think he would make it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The 2023 Women's World Cup kicks off in Australia and New Zealand on Thursday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: This year, the football tournament is bigger than ever, with 32 nations competing for the trophy.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The United States is the team to watch, aiming to make history with a third consecutive title.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: But they are set to face stiff competition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Among them, England stands tall as the reigning European champion, spearheaded by a determined lineup.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Joining the charge are football powerhouses Germany and the Netherlands, along with Spain, whose star player Alexia Budellas makes a triumphant comeback after a nine-month recovery from a ligament injury.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: And there's even more to play for, with FIFA tripling the prize money compared to 2019.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The tournament kicks off Thursday with New Zealand facing Norway in Auckland, and Australia playing Ireland in front of a sellout crowd of 80,000 people in Sydney.
